queries.comment: sum empty returns [0] instead of [null] at the moment when leaf aggregation is performed by v1 engine.
queries.description: Return empty for sum
queries.sql: SELECT sum(int_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ('foo', 'bar')

queries.description: Return empty for sum with subquery
queries.sql: SELECT sum(int_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ( SELECT string_col FROM {tbl} WHERE int_col BETWEEN 1 AND 0 GROUP BY string_col )

queries.comment: min empty returns [infinity] instead of [null] at the moment when leaf aggregation is performed by v1 engine.

queries.sql: SELECT min(int_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ('foo', 'bar')

queries.description: Return empty for min with subquery
queries.sql: SELECT min(int_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ( SELECT string_col FROM {tbl} WHERE int_col BETWEEN 1 AND 0 GROUP BY string_col )

queries.sql: SELECT distinctcount(int_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ( SELECT string_col FROM {tbl} WHERE int_col BETWEEN 1 AND 0 GROUP BY string_col )

queries.comment: FourthMoment agg function doesn't support null handling
queries.description: Return empty for skewness
queries.sql: SELECT skewness(double_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ('foo', 'bar')

queries.comment: FourthMoment agg function doesn't support null handling
queries.description: Return empty for skewness with subquery
queries.sql: SELECT skewness(double_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ( SELECT string_col FROM {tbl} WHERE int_col BETWEEN 1 AND 0 GROUP BY string_col )

queries.comment: FourthMoment agg function doesn't support null handling
queries.description: Return empty for kurtosis
queries.sql: SELECT kurtosis(double_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ('foo', 'bar')

queries.comment: FourthMoment agg function doesn't support null handling
queries.description: Return empty for kurtosis with subquery
queries.sql: SELECT kurtosis(double_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ( SELECT string_col FROM {tbl} WHERE int_col BETWEEN 1 AND 0 GROUP BY string_col )

queries.description: aggregation without groupby. hint is a no-op.
queries.sql: SELECT /*+ skipLeafStageGroupByAggregation */ avg(double_col) FROM {tbl}

queries.description: count, sum group by order by
queries.sql: select /*+ skipLeafStageGroupByAggregation */ string_col, count(int_col), sum(double_col) from {tbl} group by string_col order by string_col;

queries.description: count, sum group by order by. Multiple aggregations on single column.
queries.sql: select /*+ skipLeafStageGroupByAggregation */ string_col, max(int_col), min(double_col), count(int_col), sum(double_col) from {tbl} group by string_col order by string_col;

queries.description: aggregate boolean column
queries.sql: SELECT /*+ skipLeafStageGroupByAggregation */ bool_and(bool_col), bool_or(bool_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col

queries.description: aggregate boolean column no group by
queries.sql: SELECT /*+ skipLeafStageGroupByAggregation */ bool_and(bool_col), bool_or(bool_col) FROM {tbl}

queries.comment: sum empty returns [0] instead of [null] at the moment
queries.description: sum empty input after filter with subquery
queries.sql: SELECT /*+ skipLeafStageGroupByAggregation */ sum(int_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ( SELECT string_col FROM {tbl} WHERE int_col BETWEEN 1 AND 0 GROUP BY string_col )

queries.description: count empty input after filter with sub-query
queries.sql: SELECT count(*) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ( SELECT /*+ skipLeafStageGroupByAggregation */ string_col FROM {tbl} WHERE int_col BETWEEN 1 AND 0 GROUP BY string_col )

queries.description: count empty input after filter with sub-query
queries.sql: SELECT count(int_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE string_col IN ( SELECT /*+ skipLeafStageGroupByAggregation */ string_col FROM {tbl} WHERE int_col BETWEEN 1 AND 0 GROUP BY string_col )

queries.description: group by optimization with filter
queries.sql: SELECT /*+ skipLeafStageGroupByAggregation */ double_col, sum(int_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE int_col > 3 AND double_col > 1.0 GROUP BY double_col
SELECT min(int_col), min(int_col) FROM {tbl} WHERE int_col < 100
SELECT min(int_col), count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl}
SELECT string_col, min(int_col), count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
SELECT string_col, bool_col, min(int_col), count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col, bool_col
SELECT string_col, bool_col, min(int_col), count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col, string_col
SELECT string_col, string_col AS alias, count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col, string_col
SELECT string_col, bool_col, bool_col AS alias, sum(int_col), count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col, string_col
SELECT sum(int_col), count(int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col
SELECT string_col, min(int_col), count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col ORDER BY string_col
SELECT string_col, bool_col, min(int_col), count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col, bool_col ORDER BY string_col
SELECT string_col, bool_col, min(int_col), count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col, bool_col ORDER BY bool_col, string_col
SELECT string_col, bool_col, min(int_col), count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col, string_col ORDER BY bool_col, string_col
SELECT string_col, string_col AS alias, count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col, string_col ORDER BY string_col
SELECT string_col, string_col AS alias, count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col, string_col ORDER BY bool_col, alias
SELECT string_col, bool_col, bool_col AS alias, sum(int_col), count(int_col), count(*) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY bool_col, string_col ORDER BY alias
SELECT sum(int_col), count(int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col ORDER BY string_col

SELECT CASE WHEN bool_col THEN int_col ELSE int_col - 5 END, count(int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY CASE WHEN bool_col THEN int_col ELSE int_col - 5 END ORDER BY CASE WHEN bool_col THEN int_col ELSE int_col - 5 END
SELECT upper(string_col), count(int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY upper(string_col) ORDER BY upper(string_col)
SELECT upper(string_col), count(int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY upper(string_col) ORDER BY count(int_col)
SELECT * FROM (SELECT string_col, bool_col, min(int_col) AS m, count(int_col), count(*) AS c FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col, bool_col ORDER BY string_col) WHERE c < m
SELECT * FROM (SELECT string_col, bool_col, min(int_col) AS m, count(int_col), count(*) AS c FROM {tbl} GROUP BY string_col, bool_col ORDER BY bool_col, string_col) WHERE c < m
SELECT upper(string_col), count(int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY upper(string_col) HAVING sum(int_col) > 0 ORDER BY upper(string_col)
SELECT upper(string_col), count(int_col) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY upper(string_col) HAVING sum(int_col) >= 0 AND count(int_col) >= 0 ORDER BY count(int_col)
